1.0.name: wordpress/piggy-lite
1.0.description: Piggy is a mobile sales statistics add-on for the popular WP e-Commerce, Cart66, WooCommerce & Shopp plugins. When installed, Piggy allows access to a web-application on your ios or Android smartphone that can be used to view real-time sales and projections for your WordPress e-commerce website.
